thread.section_title: Property Matrix Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Property Matrix | propertymatrix.com
thread.title: Brad Turner
thread.title_full: Property Matrix reviewed by Brad Turner

author: Brad Turner
title: Brad Turner
text: Support readily available to chat/email, held my hand through the entire process. Accounting functions are great, tenant tracking function is even better. Love how I can include pictures of the various units and buildings. Brought in an additional employee and she was able to catch up to speed in just a few days without prior experience. I've used Yardi, MRI, Appfolio, Jenark, Rent Manager and probably a few others that I can't even think of right now and Property Matrix is easily the most user-friendly option
